name: REI_RES_PERS_AUDIT_SPEC
description: The REI_RES_PERS_AUDIT_SPEC table contains audit information about the specimens that were associated with a person for an embryology result task.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: PERS_ADT_SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The specimens that were associated to the person for the given personnel audit event.
